actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT 
    ct.id,
    ct."lookupcode", 
    ct."contactowner", 
    ct."email", 
    ct."phonenumber", 
    ct."primarycompany", 
    ct."refferer",  
    ct.creationDate, 
		ct.note,
    cts.id AS contactstatusid 
FROM crm_system_db.contact AS ct
LEFT JOIN crm_system_db.contactstatus AS cts
ON ct.contactstatusid = cts.id
WHERE ct.id = {{this.params.contactId}}
